input_data.title: La mujer del presidente
input_data.overview: Carlos Alberto Buendia is an ordinary man, good husband and worker whose life changes to be seduced by Susana de Acero, wife of the president of the company where he works. When the woman dies under mysterious circumstances Carlos Alberto is blamed for the death of the woman and is taken to prison twice. Carlos Alberto therefore must prove his innocence and try to escape the hell of Colombian jails and the corrupt justice.

response.analytical_summary: La mujer del presidente is a Colombian drama series centered on a man wrongly accused of a crime, forcing him to navigate a corrupt justice system and uncover a web of deceit. The series explores themes of betrayal, innocence, and the abuse of power, blending elements of legal thriller and social commentary. It offers a suspenseful and emotionally charged narrative, focusing on the protagonist's struggle for survival and the exposure of systemic corruption within Colombian society. The series is characterized by its intense atmosphere and exploration of moral ambiguity.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Carlos Alberto Buendia, a seemingly ordinary man, whose life is upended by an affair with Susana de Acero, the wife of a powerful executive. Following Susana's mysterious death, Carlos Alberto is immediately implicated and imprisoned, despite his claims of innocence. He endures two separate incarcerations, facing brutal conditions and false accusations. As he fights to clear his name, Carlos Alberto uncovers a conspiracy involving powerful figures within the company and the Colombian justice system. He discovers that Susana's death was not accidental, and that those responsible are attempting to frame him to protect their own interests. Throughout his ordeal, Carlos Alberto is aided by a few loyal allies who believe in his innocence and work to expose the truth. Ultimately, he manages to escape prison and, with the help of his allies, begins to systematically dismantle the conspiracy, revealing the corruption at the highest levels of power and ultimately seeking justice for Susanaâ€™s death and his own wrongful imprisonment.
response.keyword_sentence: La mujer del presidente is a dramatic crime series set in modern-day Colombia, exploring themes of innocence, corruption, and wrongful imprisonment within a suspenseful and gritty narrative.
